Class RLGlobal2DatalogRewriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.owlapi.util.OWLAxiomVisitorAdapter
      • eu.fbk.dkm.ckrdatalogrewriter.rl.rewriter.RLContext2DatalogRewriter
        • eu.fbk.dkm.ckrdatalogrewriter.rl.rewriter.RLGlobal2DatalogRewriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotationAxiomVisitor, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAxiomVisitor, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLEntityVisitor

    public class RLGlobal2DatalogRewriter
extends RLContext2DatalogRewriter
    Version:
    1.3 Encodes the Irl and Iglob rules for translation to Datalog of the global ontology.
    Author:
    Loris
